pkgmetadata.longdescription: General Network (HTTP/FTP/...) Client Interface for R // A wrapper for 'libcurl' https://curl.se/libcurl/ Provides functions to allow one to compose general HTTP requests and provides convenient functions to fetch URIs, get post forms, etc. and process the results returned by the Web server. This provides a great deal of control over the HTTP/FTP/... connection and the form of the request while providing a higher-level interface than is available just using R socket connections. Additionally, the underlying implementation is robust and extensive, supporting FTP/FTPS/TFTP (uploads and downloads), SSL/HTTPS, telnet, dict, ldap, and also supports cookies, redirects, authentication, etc.
